fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Each day phase, choose whether or not to invert death the following night. All that would have died that night will instead just survive. If you would have survived the night, you instead die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If this somehow creates a paradox, then uh idk figure it out yourself nerd

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Besides you yourself, save three people with your ability.
